abort.already_setup: You can only configure a single Nest account.
abort.authorize_url_fail: Unknown error generating an authorize url.
abort.missing_configuration: The component is not configured. Please follow the documentation.
abort.no_flows: You need to configure Nest before being able to authenticate with it. [Please read the instructions](https://www.home-assistant.io/components/nest/).
abort.single_instance_allowed: Already configured. Only a single configuration possible.

link.description:
To link your Nest account, [authorize your account]({url}).

After authorization, copy-paste the provided pin code below.
link.title: Link Nest Account
